imgDesc.text:
Remarkable aphids that have formed a symbiotic relationship with the Brewblossoms, helping to tend to the flowers while feeding off their nectar.
You can <color=#ffe14b>press Summon to issue a command</color> and call them to your side.

Once you've summoned the aphids to your side, you can <color=#ffe14b>hold the Command skill and enter aiming mode</color> , allowing you to order the aphids to move in specific directions to collect nutrients.
When brewing Aphimead, you can rely on the aphids to <color=#ffe14b>deliver collected nutrients to the brewing equipment</color> . In addition, you can direct aphids to collect nutrients and then use them to nourish withered Brewblossoms.
